remarks:
A theorem useful for eliminating the restricted existential uniqueness hypotheses in ~ reuxfr .  (Contributed by NM, 15-Nov-2004.) 

---

 A theorem useful for eliminating restricted existential uniqueness hypotheses.  (Contributed by NM, 15-Nov-2004.)
statement:
reuhyp.1 $e |- ( x e. C -> B e. C ) $.
reuhyp.2 $e |- ( ( x e. C /\ y e. C ) -> ( x = A <-> y = B ) ) $.
reuhyp $p |- ( x e. C -> E! y e. C x = A ) $.
$d B y $.
$d C y $.
$d x y $.
